name: daggy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
untidy or dirty: This hit Australian sitcom, about a daggy mother and daughter, is back for a second series. daggy caravan parks
not fashionable or attractive: Personally I would like just to be able to wear comfy daggy clothes wherever I go. I didn't want to run into people when I was looking all daggy and horrible! See
dag
More examplesFewer examplesAlthough I was young and beautiful, I still thought I was daggy and fat!"Quite frankly I love him but he looks daggy," she declared.She has resisted the urge to gain 20 kilos and wear daggy tracksuit bottoms.
